mapper.select: select u.user_name as userName, u.user_phone as phone from t_sys_user u, t_sys_driver d, t_sys_store s where s.user_code = #{userCode} and u.user_code = d.driver_code and d.province_code = s.province_code and d.city_code = s.city_code and d.area_code = s.area_code and d.is_delete = 0
